description: Deletes a single version of a DataBrew recipe.

parameters.name: RecipeVersion
parameters.description: The version of the recipe to be deleted. You can specify a numeric versions ( X.Y) or LATEST_WORKING. LATEST_PUBLISHED is not supported.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe that was deleted.

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the recipe that was deleted.
